name: 三国志之匡扶汉室
description:
This is a buyout system of the game, after the purchase will directly get the entire content of the game.

Includes subsequent updates, as well as all of the game's current story and gameplay.

This game has a powerful equipment system, as well as a strategic turn-based combat system.

This game has more than 100 martial arts to choose from. This means that you will form your own unique team of martial artists in the game.
